feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP Development
feed.subtitle: ABAP Development Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: /UI5/UI5_INFRA_APP/REP_DT_PUT Virus Scan Profile in SAP Note 3473195
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community,

Would like to ask about this SAP Note 3473195 from this link https://me.sap.com/notes/3473195. It says on the resolution that deactivate the profile /UI5/UI5_INFRA_APP/REP_DT_PUT.

I don’t know what kind of ‘deactivate the profile’ this note is referring to. What I did was simply untick the Active checkbox on its profile.

Is this the right way to deactivate the profile mentioned on the note? If no, what would be the step?

Thank you.

entry.title: Best way of providing a clean/plain REST interface?
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

We want to develop new interfaces that we would like to offer (like almost everyone else) via REST interface. I am aware that I can develop this with ABAP RAP, but only the OData standard is offered here, and this is not always suitable or too inflexible.

We would like to develop “plain/clean REST APIs.” Is there a “best way” to do this, or is it only possible using SICF and the abap if_http_extension interface?

We don't want ODATA—just a pure JSON REST service.

Thanks for any information and tips!

entry.title: ABAP Environment Trial Account ADT issue
entry.content:
Hi Gurus,

Recently Noticed that after creating ABAP environment in trial account and linking it with ADT getting below error stating 

You were successfully authenticated, but an error occurred during the Service Instance logon. Please ensure that your user has the appropriate roles.

Can any one please guide how to assign roles  "SAP_BR_DEVELOPER" as have gone trough multiple blogs where they are asking to assign roles under Access Management catalog under Administration but in trial account not able to find any such tile or app 

Reference link: 

https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-blog-posts-by-members/sap-btp-abap-environment-and-adt-troubleshooting-guide/ba-p/13527967

entry.title: authentication keeps failing in sapse/abap-cloud-developer-trial:2023
entry.content:
I successfully ran the docker image for sapse/abap-cloud-developer-trial:2023. When it is run,all the processes generally don't get started automatiacally but have to be started manually.  

/usr/local/sbin/rcscc_daemon start,

 /usr/local/bin/abaptrialinit -start-as,

/usr/local/bin/abaptrialinit -start-db etc. etc.

But authentication with DEVELOPER/ABAPtr2023#00  at https://vhcala4hci:8443/ keeps failing as if it is wrong password. What am I missing?

entry.title: RC29N-STLAL or RC29K-STLAL values
entry.content:
Hello Everyone,

I need help on how to export the values of RC29N-STLAL or RC29K-STLAL to the custom include ZXCSAU10.
The requirement is to validate BOM components in CS02.
Currently, the value of I_RC29P-STLAL is initial in ZXCSAU10, so I need to import the RC29N-STLAL or RC29K-STLAL value into the include.

Could you please provide the include name for implicit or explicit enhancement in CS01.

Thank you in advance.

entry.title: SOST - Subject translation issue
entry.content:
Hi Friends,

We have sent an email via QM01. The subject is fetched from SO10 text and has been maintained in three languages.

In English logon, the subject appears correctly. However, when I log on in another language, the subject is displayed as the default “Email triggering for notification”.

The text is being read using READ_TEXT with SY-LANGU.

Thanks with regards,

Vallamuthu M

entry.title: Issue for 261 while confirmation using BAPI_PROCORDCONF_CREATE_HDR
entry.content:
Hi, 
I am doing confirmation using the function module BAPI_PROCORDCONF_CREATE_HDR for process order and have selected for backflushing.
But only 101 is done, and 261 is not.
 
Below are the data I am passing :-
APPEND INITIAL LINE TO athdrlevels ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL (<athdrlevels>).
 <athdrlevels>-orderid    = lv wet_cake_order.
 <athdrlevels>-fin_conf   = abap_true.
 <athdrlevels>-clear_res  = abap_true.
 <athdrlevels>-postg_date = sy-datum.
 <athdrlevels>-conf_text  = 'Auto confirmed'.
 <athdrlevels>-yield = v_calc_qty.
 
APPEND INITIAL LINE TO goodsmovements ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL (<goodsmovements>).
 <goodsmovements>-material  = is_resb-matnr.
 <goodsmovements>-plant     = ls_order_header-werks.
 <goodsmovements>-move_type = '101'.
 <goodsmovements>-entry_qnt = lv_calc_qty.
 <goodsmovements>-orderid   = 1v_wet_cake_order.
 <goodsmovements>-mvt_ind   = 'F'.
 
APPEND INITIAL LINE TO link_conf_goodsmov ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL (<link_conf_goodsmov>).
 <link_conf_goodsmov>-index_confirm = '1'. 
 <link_conf_goodsmov>-index_gm_depend = '1'.
 <link_conf_goodsmov>-index_goodsmov = '1'.
 
CALL FUNCTION 'BAPI_PROCORDCONF_CREATE_HDR'        "#EC CI_USAGE_OK[2438131]
   EXPORTING
post_wrong_entries = '2'
   IMPORTING
return = ls_return
   TABLES
athdrlevels = athdrlevels
goodsmovements = goodsmovements
link_conf_goodsmov = link_conf_goodsmov
detail_return = detail_return.
 
IF NOT line_exists( detail_return[ type = 'A' ] ) AND
   NOT line_exists( detail_return[ type = 'E' ] ) AND
   NOT line_exists( detail_return[ type = 'X' ] ).
CALL FUNCTION 'BAPI TRANSACTION COMMIT
  EXPORTING
wait abap_true.
ENDIF.
 
Suggest any changes or need to add anythig else.
 
Regards 
jitendra

entry.title: ABAP ZXLWB_CALLFORM - Export Two Separate Data Sections in One Excel
entry.content:
##I have an ABAP report (ZMMHR003) that needs to export data to Excel using ZXLWB_CALLFORM. 
The data contains two vendors:1. Fixed vendor 104959 (always included)
2. Input vendor from selection screen (optional)

Current Structure:
- ZST_ZMMHR003_ITEM with all fields for both vendors
- Single table GT_OUTPUT contains mixed data

Requirement:
In Excel output, I need to show TWO SEPARATE SECTIONS:
- Section 1: Vendor 104959 data with header "I."
- Section 2: Vendor Input data with header "II."

Current Code Issue:
All data is mixed in one table, and ZXLWB template shows everything together.

entry.title: IDOC error E0400 Entry in outbound table not found even maintain in WE20
entry.content:
hi expert,

WE20 partner profile has been maintained correctly and updated in EDP13. but when we run program with our customized message type.  Still got error  Message no. E0400 entry in outbound table not found. pls advise

entry.title: Conflict between SWI1 and SOST
entry.content:
HI Friends

QM01 sends the email in German, and the document title/subject appears correctly in SWI1. However, in SOST, the document title/subject is displayed in English..

Is there any configuration between SWI1 and SOST.

 

Thanks with regards,

Vallamuthu M

entry.title: All infotype segments data should be sent when triggering RHALESMD for HRMD_A
entry.content:
Hello,

I have a requirement of sending HR masterdata via HRMD_A message type. I have configured most of the part and data is being sent.
One of my requirement is, I wat to send data based on change pointers. i.e. data should be sent for those employees who have been changed since last run. It is working fine too. But it is only sending changed data. I want all infotypes segments to be sent when I run program RHALESMD to send idocs for change pointers. 
Any idea on how to achieve this?

Regards
Param

entry.title: /SCWM/RSRC Mass Upload Issue
entry.content:
We are trying to do mass upload Custom  program for /SCWM/RSRC   we tried via  BDC progra

Issue 

When we are uploading mass upload system is showing updated successful  but after we went to /SCWM/RSRC Tcode to Check the updated entries it is not visible. 

 

And again we tried to upload same file we ended up with errors entire already existing  can some one can help..?

entry.title: RAP : Managed with Unmanaged Save with Draft handling Create Mode issue
entry.content:
Hi All,
I have created a Managed app with unmanaged save having code to trigger BAPI to save transactional data.  I have added draft functionality to this app and all works find except for create mode. 

I am able to update root and dependent child node details successfully but when a new Document is created  the earlynumbering_create method is triggered twice and MAPPED table is populated twice.

Thus  cl_numberrange_runtime=>number_get returns 1 Doc # in first run [ Draft mode ]and second run [ After Save is Hit ], Next Document number is generated. This leads to issue that when Document is shown to user a Number is shown

On Save, next Docuement # is crated by method  earlynumbering_create

Could you please suggest if you have came across such issues and solution for the same. 

Thanks !!

entry.title: SAP BAdI ME_GUI_PO_CUST: How to Prevent '0' from Displaying in Custom NUMC Fields
entry.content:
I’m working on a line item enhancement for SAP Purchase Orders (eg: via BAdI ME_GUI_PO_CUST).
I’ve added custom fields of type NUMC (numeric character) to the screen.

The issue is: when the field is left blank by the user, it defaults to displaying a series of zeros (e.g. '0' ).

I’d like the field to appear empty (blank) instead of showing all zeros when no value is entered.

What’s the best way to achieve this?

Any advice or best practices would be greatly appreciated!

Thanks in advance!

ABAP Development   SAP enhancement package for SAP ERP MM Purchasing  ABAP Development  #SAP MM #Enhancements

entry.title: Adding Fields in VL06O
entry.content:
Hello Everyone,

We have a requirement to add custom fields in VL06O. For this, I am using the user exit V50Q0001.

I was able to activate the include SAPLXV50Q successfully without any errors. However, the include ZXV50QU01 is not getting activated. why it happen.

Error: Program ZXV50QU01 contains syntax errors, perform a check to obtain details

entry.title: How to set up the device type used for 'MAIL' device in smartforms?
entry.content:
I am using a SMARTFORMS form to compose a mail. Therefore I set the DEVICE_TYPE of the output_options structure to 'MAIL'. 

In the resulting OTFDATA, I see that device type PDF1 is used:

Line 1: // XPDF1 0750 00000+00000+1 ....

Since PDF1 does not support all international characters, I want to use PDFUC instead. How do I set this up?

entry.title: Syntax error snote
entry.content:
Hi all, 

I want to implement some sap notes but got syntax error during the implementation in snote transaction. 

List of sap notes

3672151

3659117

3591163

3610322

 

Syntax error is appearing during object activation;

Method

IF_HTTP_CLIENT~RECEIVE Line 977: The field

"L_IO_OA2C_CLIENT" is unknown, but there is a

field with the similar name "LI_CLIENT". 

 

Am I missing some other prerequisity note? Which one? 

 

System

Sap basis 757 0003

Sap_aba 75H 0003

S4core 107 0003
